description: Product option for an itinerary, is either an existing booking pointer or a new booking instruction

product.description: Product in core which encapsulates at least an id, name and a tspProductId

fare.description: A fare/price as billed to the user in WMPs or in tokens

items.description: A fare/price as billed to the user in WMPs or in tokens

terms.description: MaaS booking terms and condition for its business engine

type.description: A type of ticket/product that this booking is valid for - should be unique within a given region, e.g. 'Single ticket / Lähiseutu 2'. When reusing the tickets in maas-backend, the 'type' field is checked for equality.

startTime.description: Epoch when the outbound ticket will be valid

endTime.description: Epoch when the outbound ticket will be invalid

startTimeReturn.description: Epoch when the return ticket will be valid

endTimeReturn.description: Epoch when the return ticket will be invalid

currency.description: Accepted monetary unit in ISO 4127 format, see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217#cite_note-1

timeInterval.description: Amount of seconds that fare rate is applied to

startAt.description: Amount of seconds after this fare rate should be applied to

meta.description: TSP/mode-specific additional information. The TSP adapter should set MODE_{mode} with defined data, otherwise 'meta' can be used freely.

location.description: Geographic latitude-longitude object in WGS-84 system, see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/World_Geodetic_System

lat.description: Geographic latitude (north-south axis) in WGS-84 system, see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/World_Geodetic_System

lon.description: Geographic longitude (east-west axis) in WGS-84 system, see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/World_Geodetic_System

location.description: Geographic latitude-longitude object in WGS-84 system, see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/World_Geodetic_System

lat.description: Geographic latitude (north-south axis) in WGS-84 system, see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/World_Geodetic_System

lon.description: Geographic longitude (east-west axis) in WGS-84 system, see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/World_Geodetic_System

image.description: Uniform resource locator, see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Uniform_Resource_Locator and https://mathiasbynens.be/demo/url-regex

passengers.description: The number of passengers this vehicle will be able to transport

doors.description: The number of doors this car model may have - an array of min & max

luggage.description: The number of luggage this vehicle will be able to transport - an array of [big, small] luggage

classification.description: ACRISS classification of the car, see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ACRISS_Car_Classification_Code

registrationPlate.description: Registration plate (e.g. if we know the actual car already)

damage.description: Any reported damages to the car (if available)

fuelLevel.description: The percentage of fuel the car has at the moment

lat.description: Geographic latitude (north-south axis) in WGS-84 system, see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/World_Geodetic_System

lon.description: Geographic longitude (east-west axis) in WGS-84 system, see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/World_Geodetic_System

startEndGeoRegionUrl.description: Region in which car can be rented and returned. Url to GeoJSON file

type.description: A type of ticket/product that this booking is valid for - should be unique within a given region, e.g. 'Single ticket / Lähiseutu 2'. When reusing the tickets in maas-backend, the 'type' field is checked for equality.

startTime.description: Epoch when the outbound ticket will be valid

endTime.description: Epoch when the outbound ticket will be invalid

startTimeReturn.description: Epoch when the return ticket will be valid

endTimeReturn.description: Epoch when the return ticket will be invalid

timeInterval.description: Amount of seconds that fare rate is applied to

startAt.description: Amount of seconds after this fare rate should be applied to
